typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		result as (Amount_Discount as string, CAIS as short, COMPANY as string, CONCESSION_Code as string, CONCESSION_Description as string, CONCESSION_ID as integer, Compartment as string, Cost as string, Inseam as string, LINE_ID as short, Line_Applied as double, NetSold_Amount as string, NetSold_Qty as short, New_Price_After_Discount as string, Percent_Discount as double, PriceOverride as boolean, RCPT_NOTE1 as string, RCPT_NOTE2 as string, Retail_Price as string, SALE_TYPE as string, Shop_Code as string, Shop_Name as string, SubCompartment as string, Surver_Age as string, Surver_Gender as string, TAX_AMOUNT1 as double, TAX_AMOUNT2 as double, TAX_RATE as double, TRANSDATE as date, TRANSNUM as short, TRANSTIME as integer, TRANSTIMESTR as integer, TS_ID as timestamp, TYPE as string, Unit_Price_Sold as string, VOID_FLAG as boolean, Waist as string, emp_Name as string, emp_code as string, nick_name as string, prod_code as string, vipcode as double)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(result),
	mapColumn(
		result
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(Shop_Code = result.Shop_Code,
		Shop_Name = result.Shop_Name,
		COMPANY = result.COMPANY,
		Compartment = result.Compartment,
		SubCompartment = result.SubCompartment,
		TYPE = result.TYPE,
		nick_name = result.nick_name,
		prod_code = result.prod_code,
		NetSold_Qty = result.NetSold_Qty,
		Cost = result.Cost,
		Retail_Price = result.Retail_Price,
		Unit_Price_Sold = result.Unit_Price_Sold,
		PriceOverride = result.PriceOverride,
		CONCESSION_ID = result.CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code = result.CONCESSION_Code,
		New_Price_After_Discount = result.New_Price_After_Discount,
		CONCESSION_Description = result.CONCESSION_Description,
		Amount_Discount = result.Amount_Discount,
		Percent_Discount = result.Percent_Discount,
		NetSold_Amount = result.NetSold_Amount,
		TAX_RATE = result.TAX_RATE,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 = result.TAX_AMOUNT1,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 = result.TAX_AMOUNT2,
		emp_code = result.emp_Name,
		Emp_Name = result.emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE = result.TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME = result.TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM = result.TRANSNUM) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		json_value as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Store_Code = Shop_Code,
		Store_Name = Shop_Name,
		COMPANY,
		Compartment,
		SubCompartment,
		TYPE,
		nick_name,
		prod_code,
		NetSold_Qty,
		Cost,
		Retail_Price,
		Unit_Price_Sold,
		FinalPrice = PriceOverride,
		CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code,
		New_Price_After_Discount,
		CONCESSION_Description,
		Amount_Discount,
		Percent_Discount,
		NetSold_Amount,
		TAX_RATE,
		TAX_AMOUNT1,
		TAX_AMOUNT2,
		emp_code,
		Emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM
	)) ~> sink1
